## Type of Contribution

- [ ] New skill
- [ ] Locale overlay (new or updated)
- [ ] Fix / correction to existing content
- [ ] New validation scenario
- [ ] New reporting KPI or alert
- [ ] Error handling scenario
- [ ] Template or spec update
- [ ] Other: ___

## Checklist

### All contributions
- [ ] Content is accurate and verifiable
- [ ] No proprietary or confidential information included
- [ ] No personally identifiable information (PII) included
- [ ] Clear, professional English

### New skills
- [ ] Follows [skill format specification](../spec/SKILL_FORMAT.md)
- [ ] All required sections present (Purpose, Process Steps, Inputs/Outputs, Integration Points, Dependencies, Roles, Reporting, Error Handling)
- [ ] `reference_framework` included in frontmatter metadata
- [ ] `## Framework Alignment` section included in skill body
- [ ] Corresponding `metadata.yaml` created
- [ ] At least 3 validation scenarios included
- [ ] At least 3 KPIs in the Reporting section
- [ ] At least one locale overlay included

### Locale overlays
- [ ] Follows [locale format specification](../spec/LOCALE_FORMAT.md)
- [ ] `last_updated` date in frontmatter
- [ ] `legal_framework` field listing relevant legislation
- [ ] Regulatory references are cited with specific law/section numbers
- [ ] Reviewed by someone with in-country domain expertise
